modName: CHSBHC v3 - ADM - CBBE   Elewin Pumps Mark I and II
summary: My CBBE based conversion of the heels, lovingly referred to as Pumps and Platforms  :}
descriptionHtml:
A conversion HEEL set from Elewin, HDTHeels group.
*** Elewin was removed for loving Pin-up-poser.  I tried for perfection madam  :) ***


[center][b]Tell me please if I missed anything  :([/center][/b]

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]

CHSBv3 - ADM - CBBE conversions of [i]the[/i] Heels.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29687/?]Mark I[/url] (high sandals)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30642/?]Mark II[/url] (platform)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36213/?]HDTHeels[/url] (system)
(I used v1 (beta1), may work on the newer HDT)

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

Endorse the originals, not me.Self contained, both body types and bounces.  MAYBE, PERHAPS, Generally CBBE compatible.


*** [u]Clothing and some Armor now available[/u] :  Cloth, Steel, Dwarven, Elven, Orc, Dragon Scale/Bone ***

[b]Naming convention is as follows :[/b]
- first [u]color name[/u] is the platform color
- second [u]color name[/u] is the cover color

*** Two elegant chests across Breezehome, Whiterun have the clothing versions ***


\"help epump 0\"  and \"help eplat 0\"      craftable, upgradable (may lose enchantment if custom heel height applied).


[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/5503/issues2.png[/IMG]

1- The bounce and motions are dependent on calves. SORRY.  :(
2- craftable and upgradable (may lose enchantment if custom heel height applied).  Where clothing can be found at the forge.
3- some funny looking feet, because I\'m crazy that way (unp feet =/= cbbe feet)
4- may have missed some recipes and combos, tell me if I did please.

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
author: elewin  HydrogensaysHDT
